entry.title: Play Script | Linux Based Builds Now Available
entry.content:
http://sushihangover.github.io/images/PlayscriptLogo_small.png"> I have cleaned up issues for the Linux builds and they are now working properly. See the Travis CI files in the CI directory and the .travis.yml file in the root of the PlayScript repo for details.

http://blog.travis-ci.com/images/travis-mascot-200px.png"> Travis CI has also enabled OS-X builds for the PlayScript repo. Very cool company, great support and amazing that they offer this service for free to open source projects. They have a great company blog also…
